title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - recommendations for new policies and policy finetuning
description:
,Microsoft
Purview DLP overview page will have two new cards: for DLP with 2 Cards that
show Analytics with 1-click recommendations: Highlighting the key risk and the
option to create a one-click policy to mitigate the risk, and Recommendation to
fine tune existing DLP policies to make them effective and reduce alerts.
